text: @TexasDownUnder @drjjw @marcelsalathe Impressive and valuable nonetheless.  And caveating numbers is so pre-COVID.  <- facetious

The disparities in #COVID-19 deaths are devastating. This is not news, but these numbers (big for every group, more than 2x as big for African Americans) are sickening. Almost one in every 1000 African Americans has been killed by this controllable virus. https://t.co/VWgliDCkIf

Fascinating and high-tech investigation of a fishing vessel COVID outbreak https://t.co/Yif0LkAF1x with hints of seroprotection, and extremely high attack rate ~85%. Two critical findings at least, from well-done outbreak epidemiology. T cells didn't protect them from infection.
